comments.body:
tbh I'm all confused now about the keys we are going to use now. 

/cc @luxas

For kubeadm at least, look at the issues and https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/41835.
The taint key and value should equal the master label's key and value which for now seems to be `node-role.kubernetes.io/master` with no value `""`

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +77,81 @@      hostNetwork: true
      tolerations:
      - key: "dedicated"
        value: "master"
        effect: "NoSchedule"
